players.name: Bob
memory: Diana: "I am the detective and I found Charlie is the mafioso"
You: "Bob is not the mafioso. I haven't made any accusations and have remained silent, as I am a villager."
Charlie: "I am the mafioso and I killed Alice last night. Diana correctly identified me as the mafioso. Bob confirmed he is not the mafioso, which means he must be a villager."
